title: CREATE VENDOR (SUPPLIER)
description:
1.Click on ‘Vendor (Supplier)’ from Library.

2.Find: Vendor (Supplier) page will be displayed on the right workspace area. Click on ‘New’...

title: CREATE A FINISHED GOODS FACTORY
description:
1.Click on ‘Vendor (Supplier)’ in Libraries.

2.Find: Vendor (Supplier) page will be displayed on the right workspace area and Click on ‘New’...

title: ASSOCIATE FINISHED GOODS FACTORIES TO A VENDOR
description:
1.Go to the ‘Supplier Details’ page of a Vendor to whom Factories have to be associated.

2. Under the Relationships attribute, Click on ‘Edit’...

title: TO CREATE A MATERIAL SUPPLIER
description:
1. Click on ‘Vendor (Supplier)’.

2.Find: Vendor (Supplier) page will be displayed on the right workspace area and Click on ‘New’...

title: CREATE MATERIAL
description:
1.Click on 'Libraries'.

2.Click on 'Material'...

title: ADD SUPPLIER TO MATERIAL
description:
1.On Material details page, click on ‘Add Suppliers’ from ‘Actions’ drop down List.

2.Find: Supplier page pops up. Select the required Sub Type (Example- Material Supplier)...

title: ADD COLORS TO MATERIALS
description:
1.Navigate to the 'Color' tab on the Material page. Select the Supplier.

2.Select 'Add Color'(in case of a single color) or Add Multiple colors...

title: DEFINE SUPPLIER SPECIFIC DETAILS AND PRICE OF MATERIAL
description:
1.On the Material Details page, select the supplier from the ‘Supplier’ drop down list.

2.Click on Update Material Supplier from Actions drop down...

title: UPDATE MATERIAL-SUPPLIER COLOR DETAILS
description:
1.Go to Color tab and select the supplier from the ‘Supplier’ drop down list

2.Scroll down and click on Material Color from Actions drop down against the required Color details...

title: CREATING MATERIAL (COLOR DEVELOPMENT) SAMPLE REQUESTS
description:
1.Navigate to the Material Details page and Select Supplier from drop down.

2. Choose the Material Color from the list. For Example- We choose B627 FOG GREY...

title: UPDATE A COLOR DEVELOPMENT REQUEST
description: 1.Click on Include Sample under Material Color tab and click on the required Color Development Sample Request Name from the list. For Example – We choose 63 Lab-dips...

title: ADD A DOCUMENT TO MATERIAL
description:
1.On the Materials Details page, Click on ‘Documents’ tab.

2. ‘Materials Documents’ page opens. Navigate to the bottom of the page to find ‘Material Document’...

title: CREATE OTHER TYPE OF MATERIALS
description:
1.Click on 'Libraries'.

2.Click on 'Material'...

title: Trims
description:
1.Click on 'Libraries'.

2.Click on 'Material'...

title: Zippers
description:
1.Click on 'Libraries'.

2.Click on 'Material'...

title: Puller
description:
1.Click on 'Libraries'. (Same as above).

2.Click on 'Material'. (Same as above)...

title: Logo
description:
1. Click on 'Libraries'.

 2.Click on 'Material'...

title: Hand Goods
description:
1. Click on 'Libraries'.

 2.Click on 'Material'.

title: Embellishment
description:
1.Click on 'Libraries'.

2.Click on 'Material'...

title: Packaging
description:
1.Click on 'Libraries'.

2.Click on 'Material'...

title: Hand Tag
description:
1.Click on 'Libraries'.

2.Click on 'Material'...

title: Reinforcement
description:
1.Click on 'Libraries'.

2.Click on 'Material'...

title: Foam
description:
1.Click on 'Libraries'.

2.Click on 'Material'...

title: Chemical
description:
1.Click on 'Libraries'.

2.Click on 'Material'...

title: Wheeled Component
description:
1.Click on 'Libraries'.

2.Click on 'Material'...

title: Trolley
description:
1.Click on 'Libraries'.

2.Click on 'Material'...

title: Leather
description:
1.Click on 'Libraries'.

2.Click on 'Material'...

title: Charms
description:
1.Click on 'Libraries'.

2.Click on 'Material'...

title: Monkey
description:
1.Click on 'Libraries'.

2.Click on 'Material'...

title: ADD SOURCING CONFIGURATION TO A PRODUCT
description: Client XYZ business will associate vendor and factory where the product is being sourced. In the system this will be done through sourcing configuration...

title: UPDATE SOURCING CONFIGURATION
description: 1.To add factory details navigate to the Sourcing Summary tab and select CLIENT XYZ Source from Source drop down...

title: MATERIAL AGGREGATION REPORT
description: This report/extension provides an aggregate view of all the materials used in a season.  The materials, quantity usage are all rolled-up from the BOMs associated to Products in the Season...

title: CREATE SPECIFICATIONS FOR PRODUCTS
description:
1.Select Season from My Seasons drop down and click on Line Sheet.

2.Select the Product...

title: UPDATE SPECIFICATIONS
description:
1.Go to Specifications.

2.Click on Action Dropdown on the Right and Select Update Spec Option.

title: CREATE SPECIFICATIONS COMPONENTS SEPARATELY
description:
1.Go to Product Specification Page.

2.Click on Materials Tab...

title: Create BOM
description:
1.Go to Product Specification Page.

2.Click on Materials Tab...

title: Add BOM Components
description: 1.To add materials, navigate to any component where the materials need to be attached (Example, Fabric and Leather)...

title: Adding Colors to the Material Components
description:
1.To add Color to the Material, click in the cell below Color column.

2.Click on Colors button...

title: Completing a BOM line item to get the Total Price
description: 1.After the Materials and the Colors have been added, type in the Consumption by clicking on the section below that column...

title: Remove a Material from the BOM
description:
1.Click on the Clear option.

2.Hold the ‘Ctrl’ key on keyboard and left click (on mouse) on the Material name.

title: Smart Insert Material
description:
1.Click on the Material or Color section of a line item.

2.Type: name or part of name* (Example: Teeth*)

title: Create BoM with Colorway Variation
description:
1.Make sure the Colorways are reflecting on the BOM page.

2.Click on the checkbox against the material which has to be replaced by another material for a Colorway.

title: Create Image Page
description:
1.Navigate to Season > Line Sheet > Product > Specifications >Images.

2.Click on ‘Add New Image Page’.

title: ADD EXISTING COMPONENTS TO SPECIFICATION SET
description:
1.BOM is created under the Product as an individual component.

2.Go to the Product Specification Page.

title: GENERATE TECH PACK
description:
1.Navigate to the Product Specifications Summary page.

2.Select Specification from the Drop down. Source is automatically selected.

title: SEARCHING A COLORFORM IN LIBRARY
description:
1.Go to Libraries.

2.Click on Colorform...

title: GROUPING IN SEARCH RESULTS
description:
1.Go to the search Results.

2.Click on the attribute to be grouped (Example -GBA).

title: EDIT SEARCH RESULTS
description:
1.Click on Update Results link on Search Results displaying all the colorforms in the Library.

2.Go to the attribute Value which is to be updated.(Example- Main Material For first Colorform)...

title: EXPORT COLORFORM TO PDF AND EXCEL FORMATS
description:
1. Go to Libraries.

2.Click on Colorform.

title: SAMPLE MANAGEMENT
description: The samples are general requested by the EMEA and US team to PD Asia. PD Asia will get the sample developed from the vendor...

title: PRODUCT SAMPLES
description: Design / merchandise team will create the sample request to PD Asia (CLIENT XYZ) and PD Asia (CLIENT XYZ) will allocate the sample request to the vendor factory...

title: Create Proto Sample Request from Product
description: Client XYZ EMEA users will create Concept, Proto and Soft Lock samples. Soft Lock Samples are the final samples created in Product Development process...

title: Create Finalisation Sample Request from Product
description:
1.Navigate to the Product from Season (US Season) Line Sheet. Navigate to Sourcing tab and then Samples.

2. Select Source and Specification.

title: Create Sample Request from Line Sheet
description: 1.Navigate to the Season Line Sheet and select required Product and click on Create New Samples from Actions drop down...

title: Create Sample Request from Sample Tracking Report
description: Product Samples can be created from Sample Tracking Report as well. The steps have been explained under Sample Tracking Report...

title: Update Sample Request
description:
1.Navigate to the Sample Request and click on Update from Actions drop down.

2.Fill all the required details and click on Save...

title: Adding Tech Pack and Images to the Sample Request
description:
1.Navigate to the Sample Request and click on View from Actions drop down.

2.Click on Document tab and click on Add Existing Reference Document from Actions drop down...

title: Adding Sample information into Tech Pack
description: 1. Navigate to the Create Tech Pack pop up page. (Steps have been explained in Specification Tech Pack manual. Please refer to that)...

title: VRD Sample Tracking Report
description:
1.Navigate to the season from My Seasons drop down.

2.Click on Sample Tracking from Reports.

title: Creation of Samples from Sample Tracking Report
description:
1.Go to the Options tab of the Report.

2.When the Include Products without Samples is checked then the report will contain all the Products for which sample requests have not been requested.

title: PDF and Excel export of the report
description:
The excel and PDF export of the Report can be taken by clicking icons.

For other Products user can track the sample development process by exporting this report in either excel or in pdf...

title: Sample Library Search
description:
1.Navigate to the Sample Library.

2.Find Sample page will display. Enter the Search criteria and click on Search...

title: Mass Update Search Results
description:
1.Go to the Search Results Page.

2.Click on Update Results...

title: Request Color Development Samples (Lab Dips)
description: Client XYZ users can request Color Development samples from Material library as well as from Material Color Palette...

title: Request Color Development Samples from Material Library
description:
1.Navigate to the Material Color page and select Source.

2.Select Material Color and click on Create New Color Development Request from Color Actions drop down.

title: Request Color Development Sample Requests from Material Color Palette
description:
1.Navigate to Season Palette and click on Material Color Palette.

2.Select the Material Colors for which lab dips to be requested...

title: Request Color Development Sample Requests from Material Library Search
description:
1.Navigate to the Material Library.

2.Find Material page will display. Enter Search criteria like choose Material Type from hierarchy, Material Status, Name etc. to narrow down the search results and click on Search.

title: Request Color Development Sample Requests from Lab Dip Tracking Report
description: Users can create multiple lab dips for multiple materials from multiple seasons at one go. The steps have been explained below under Lap Dip Tracking...

title: Update Color Development Sample Requests (Lab Dips)
description: Please Refer Section 2.7...

title: Create Multiple Samples within a Sample Request
description:
Process is same as Product Sample.

Please refer Product Sample...

title: VRD Lab Dip Tracking Report
description: Process is same as Product Sample. Please refer Product Sample.Unlike the library view of samples, the data is organized based on the seasonal product information...

title: Sample Library Search
description: User can search Material Samples (Lab Dips) from Sample Library Search Results.This functionality will give users to create different Views...

title: CREATE COST SHEET
description:
1.Navigate to Season > Line Sheet > Product > Sourcing. Click on ‘Costing’ tab.

2.Select Source from the drop down list

title: UPDATE COST SHEET
description:
1.Navigate to Product > Sourcing > Costing.

2.Go to the Cost Sheet tab.

title: SET COST SHEET AS PRIMARY
description:
1.Go to the Cost Sheet.

2.Go to Actions dropdown list and Select Set as Primary.

title: CREATE MULTIPLE COST SHEETS
description:
1.Go to the Cost Sheet List tab.

2.Go to Actions dropdown list and Select Create Multiple Cost Sheets option.

title: COLORWAY LEVEL COSTING
description:
1.Navigate to Product > Sourcing > Costing.

2.Select Create Cost Sheet option in Action dropdown list under Cost Sheet list tab.

title: WHAT IF COSTING
description:
1.Go to Product Costing Page.

2.Go to Cost Sheet List tab.

title: COST SHEET COMPARISON
description:
1.Go to Product Sourcing Cost sheet Compare tab.

2.Cost Sheet Comparison will display below.

title: COST SHEET ITERATIONS AND COMPARISON
description:
1.Go to the Product Costing Page.

2.Go to the Cost Sheet list tab and Select the Cost sheet.
